movies.title: The Mentalist (1) Title here
movies.description: The Mentalist (1) Description here. Golden Globe nominee Simon Baker stars as an independent consultant for the California Bureau of Investigation with a remarkable track record for solving crimes using only his razor sharp skills of observation.
movies.directors: A B CDH, E F GHI
movies.casts: A B CDH, E F GHI, J KLMN, O PQR
